sense.def:
One's profile
je obris človekovega obraza, gledan od strani.

seg.quote: She glanced at his haughty profile.

sense.def:
A profile of someone
je kratek članek ali oddaja, ki opisuje življenje in značaj nekega človeka.

seg.quote: She wanted to write profiles of the founders of the Party.

sense.def:
To keep a low profile
pomeni ne počenjati stvari, zaradi katerih bi nas drugi opazili.

seg.quote: Keep a low profile until you have had time to settle in.
